description:
***** CREATED NOVEMBER 2015 *****

THIS IS AND WILL BE THE BEST BRANDING, MARKETING AND SALES COURSE IN THE INTERNET!!

Over 1.400 students from over 100 countries have already started SELLING MORE with the Searching for Excellence Series!! WHY DON'T YOU?

Look at what they say about this course!

"Looking forward to the next course

This course is an introduction to a series on branding strategy. I had not heard of the magneter model before. Thus far, the manner in which the information has been presented seems innovative and not a rehash of the usual branding training. I look forward to the next in the series. Instructor is engaging and seems to be an expert on the topic."

***********************

I’m Francisco Trigueros and I want you to join me in this course to show you what I’ve been working for the last years. I’ve spent countless hours working and self-learning all this from so many experts in the World, some are friends and some are not, and I want to share it with you because I promise that you won’t find no content like this anywhere in the Internet since I’ve developed it all by myself during the last years.

This will be a 1 hour course where I’ll share my discoveries (I sometimes call them revelations since they come to me in those AHA! moments), my new developments and methodologies on how to create your brand, how to build it strong and how to make it grow to unlimited heights. Though I’m now specialized in the luxury market, since it is one of the few markets that strive for excellence and I chose to be surrounded by excellence, all this knowledge can be applied to any industry and any brand no matter how small or how big it is.

As you can imagine, this course is for those who want to stay away from mediocrity and also be surrounded by excellence in their work and in their lifes.

Most of the insights and techniques that I’ve developed have been quite effusively recommended through my articles in LinkedIn by many CEO’s, consultants and executives of some of the most prestigious firms in the World within the luxury market as you might have seen at the bottom of the Home or the contact page.

If you’re planning to create a new brand or you’ve already started a company and are struggling with getting more clients, more sales and more engagement, and want to lead your industry regardless of the competence, this is your course.
title: Sell more with Searching for Excellence Series - S4E 101
